price: (60) They said, "We heard a young man mention them who is called Abraham."
arabic: قَالُواْ سَمِعۡنَا فَتٗى يَذۡكُرُهُمۡ يُقَالُ لَهُۥٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمُ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qālū samiʿ'nā fatan yadhkuruhum yuqālu lahu ib'rāhīmu
